biotools.summary:
Shedding light on proteins of unknown function in biomineralization with user friendly tools illustrated using mollusc shell matrix protein sequences.

This is the project page for ProminTools: a collection of bioinformatic tools for the analysis of protein seqeunces thought to be involved in biomineralization.
